name: config-converter
title: Config Converter
description: Convert JSON objects to shell environment variables
author: julius_hell

commands.name: json2environment
commands.title: Json2Environment
commands.description: Convert a JSON object to a string that can be used in a shell environment

commands.name: json2environmentB64
commands.title: Json2Environment - Base64
commands.description: Convert a JSON object to a string that can be used in a shell environment and encode the values in base64

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
